name: Weather-bot
tagline: A bot to tell you the weather in a particular place
body:
### Welcome to weather-bot
This is a bot that I created while I was learning to use the wit.ai framework. It's a pretty simple bot. It's got integrations with the Google geocoder API and Forecast.io . 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
